poem:
Visa Ban

so much depends
upon

a passport stamp
drying

on the tongue
of "free speech"—

while in the feed
harm blooms
black

Ofcom hears it
across water,
Breton named,
five shadows turned away—

Silicon Valley counts
coins
and calls it liberty

the screen,
white as snow,
does not forgive.
